content: p a t e p a t t e e t e e e r r r r n f n f glove world hat glove world hat pattern by @chamomilewonders pattern by @chamomilewonders abbreviations disclaimer mc - magic_ring terms of use please do not copy chain - chain or redistribute any part of this slip_stitch - slip_stitch pattern as your own you may sell single_crochet - single_crochet your finished products but credit increase - increase the pattern creator decrease - decrease blo - back loop only notes fo - fasten_off x# - repeat the sequence # of times # - indicates total number of when leaving a long tail to sew stitches in the row wrap the working yarn twice around materials the opening to get a good length decrease 3 st means you ll make a labubu single_crochet decrease with the 6 50 mm hook next 3 stitches super bulky chenille yarn measure the project as you go onto sewing needle your labubu depending on your yarn or hook size you may need to scissors add/subtract increase row thread color of your choice @chamomilewonders start off with a magic_ring or chain 2 for each base r1 single_crochet 6 6 r2 increase x6 single_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch into the first st 12 r3 single_crochet increase x6 chain 4 single_crochet into the chain 2 space chain 4 slip_stitch into the first st 19 r4 single_crochet 18 single_crochet 6 in the chain 4 space single_crochet single_crochet 6 in the chain 4 space slip_stitch into the first st 31 r5 single_crochet 23 decrease 3 st single_crochet 5 28 r6 skip st single_crochet 16 decrease 3 st single_crochet 7 decrease 3 st including skip st 25 r7 blo place a slip_stitch in each st 25 fo & hide the tail sew the fingers along the head keep them aligned behind the labubu s ears fingers embroidered details thumb 1 other fingers 2 grab your colored thread and embroider r1 single_crochet 4 4 3 lines at the front of the hat r1 single_crochet 4 4 r2 blo single_crochet 4 4 r2 blo single_crochet 4 4 r3 - r4 single_crochet 4 4 r3 - r4 single_crochet 4 4 r5 single_crochet 2 2 fo & leave tail for sewing for each middle finger 1 r1 single_crochet 5 5 r2 blo single_crochet 5 5 r3 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 r4 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 3 r5 single_crochet 3 3 finished & enjoy ♡ tag me in your projects @chamomilewonders @chamomilewonders @chamomilewonders
